trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Golden
There were 2 other sightings in Golden on or around September 30th 2013
Summary: Very fast moving Boomerang ship flew over with no sound!
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching Monday night football and went outside to smoke a cigar. I was looking at the sky talking to a friend when this large boomerang shaped ship flew into my view. It was moving south to north. I watched it until it disappeared. Like 4 seconds. It made No sound. It had several round lights on the wing. I had no idea what the object was it happened so fast. I'd like to think its man made but I've never seen anything so big moving so fast making no noise. I feel very lucky to have witnessed this. I'm amazed. I had to tell someone ASAP. I found Doug's number and called. I'm beside myself knowing that boomerang ship does for sure exist and it not some discovery channel BS.
